**Toothbrush with Built-in Whitening Strips**: Integrate a small compartment in the toothbrush handle that releases whitening strips as you brush, providing an extra layer of teeth whitening and a refreshing experience.

**Electric Toothbrush with AI-Powered Brushing**: Design an electric toothbrush with an AI-powered sensor that detects and adapts to your brushing technique, providing real-time feedback and guidance for improved oral hygiene.

**Toothbrush with Integrated Flossing**: Create a toothbrush with a retractable, thin thread that can be extended and retracted for easy flossing, making it a one-stop solution for brushing and flossing.
**Toothbrush with Built-in UV Sanitizer**: Develop a toothbrush with a built-in UV sanitizer that kills bacteria and germs on the brush head, ensuring a hygienic cleaning experience.

**Toothbrush with Personalized Brushing Patterns**: Design a toothbrush that comes with a companion app, allowing users to create customized brushing patterns based on their individual oral health needs and preferences.
